vulnerabilities.title: Hexo `include_code` has a path traversal
vulnerabilities.description: Hexo up to v7.1.1 was discovered to contain an arbitrary file read vulnerability.

vulnerabilities.title: Hexo Vulnerable to XSS
vulnerabilities.description: Hexo versions 0.0.1 to 5.4.0 are vulnerable against stored XSS. The post “body” and “tags” don’t sanitize malicious javascript during web page generation. Local unprivileged attacker can inject arbitrary code.
